comment.author: 82596826@N03
comment._content:
Shows an AEG J.1.  ground attack aircraft and American Doughboys . The barrels & flash hiders of the twin downward pointing MG08/15 machine guns have been removed.  Cunel is a small village in eastern France, located beside the Meuse-Argonne American Cemetery and Memorial. 

Same wreck:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/82596826@N03/7800573134/in/photostream]

Another photo quite possibly taken near Cunel:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/drakegoodman/3806404801/in/faves-82596826@N03/">www.flickr.com/photos/drakegoodman/3806404801/in/faves-82...]
